title: The Printer Prank
setting: Baxter & Bloom PR Agency, print room, Wednesday 9 AM
premise: Someone reprogrammed the main office printer to print 'HUMP DAY' on a watermark across every document. The printer's admin log shows the setting was changed at 6:42 AM Wednesday.

suspects.name: Fiona Drake
suspects.motive: Overheard complaining that 'this office has zero fun'
suspects.alibi: I don't get in until 9 AM -- interns start at nine. I took the 8:15 crosstown bus from my apartment and arrived at 8:55. The bus driver sees me every day.

suspects.name: Charlie Russo
suspects.motive: Famous in the office for Wednesday 'Hump Day' email blasts
suspects.alibi: I was at the gym across the street from 5:30 to 7:00 AM. I swiped in and out with my membership card. Then I came straight to the office and made coffee.

suspects.name: Wanda Mitchell
suspects.motive: Upset that management approved a new printer to replace her beloved old one
suspects.alibi: I arrived at 7:15 AM like always. I went directly to my office at the far end of the hall and started processing yesterday's print queue. I didn't touch the main printer until 8:30.

suspects.name: Harris Gill
suspects.motive: Has a running joke about making Wednesdays more entertaining
suspects.alibi: I came in early at 6:15 AM to finish a client draft before the morning rush. I was in the fourth-floor writing room with my laptop. The door was shut the whole time.

clues.title: Early Bird Sighting
clues.content: The cleaning crew, who leave at 6:30 AM, saw only one employee in the building before they left. That person was on the fourth floor.

clues.title: Printer Access Requirement
clues.content: The printer admin panel requires a six-digit code that only three people know: Wanda, the IT director (who is on vacation), and Charlie (the designated print services backup).

clues.title: Gym Swipe Records
clues.content: The gym confirms Charlie swiped in at 5:30 AM but has no record of a swipe-out. The gym's policy requires swiping out, and their system logs every exit without exception.
